titleStmt.title: The golden age. Or The liues of Iupiter and Saturne, with the deifying of the heathen gods As it hath beene sundry times acted at the Red Bull, by the Queenes Maiesties Seruants. Written by Thomas Heyvvood.
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] for William Barrenger, and are to be sold at his shop neare the great north-doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
